thread.title: Glut forces memory makers to slow investment
thread.title_full: Glut forces memory makers to slow investment

title: Glut forces memory makers to slow investment
text:
Glut forces memory makers to slow investment 
TechEye Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
of DRAM has said it won't upgrade its fabrication facilities in 2016. 
SK Hynix had created a state of the art fabrication plant in Icheon, Korea, but will slow down investment. 
The reason it gave was an uncertain business outlook but analysts have reported that there will be oversupply of DRAM memory chips well into next year. 
Samsung is also believed to have put the brakes on memory production â€“ the oversupply combines with the strong US dollar to mean that demand remains weak. 
Samsung is ahead of the DRAM largest three manufacturers which include SK Hynix and US memory comp...
